text:
The startup scripts ( xindice.sh and xindice.bat ) do not work under JDK 1.3.1
because of issues with the Forehead Java class loader tool.

They work fine under JDK 1.4.1 but under 1.3.1, upon start, deliver an exception :

java.lang.NumberFormatException:
/home/aadid/apache-workspace/xml-xindice/tools/jetty/conf/main.xml
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:414)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:463)
        at org.mortbay.util.InetAddrPort.<init>(InetAddrPort.java:83)
        at org.mortbay.http.HttpServer.main(HttpServer.java:1410)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.werken.forehead.Forehead.run(Forehead.java:551)
        at com.werken.forehead.Forehead.main(Forehead.java:581)

Recommed removing the use forehead.
creator: mailinglists@clubmom-inc.com
